Trade/Device Name(s): Diazyme high sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP) POC Test kit
Diazyme high sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP) POC control kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Diazyme hsCRP POC Test Kit and Control Kit for quantitative measurement of C-reactive protein in whole blood on SMART analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of C-reactive protein in human venous whole blood on SMART analyzers to aid in detection and evaluation of inflammatory disorders, infection, and tissue injury; control set for quality control use with test kit
